title: ERR: Email to a friend
instructions: Work in pairs of "player A" and "player B" and use a shared phone. Look at whose scoreboard is active and take turns to click on the correct word as quick as you can. You have 5 seconds to do so. If you don't click while your scoreboard is active, you'll miss the opporunity and your question will be given to your partner to answer. You get extra points for speed if your answer is correct. No points whatsoever for incorrect answers. Click on "Feedback" at the end of the game to see just that, some feedback on your answers.
cards: On this day the weather was sunny.
In this day the weather was sunny.
I was go to the gym
we went to buy some food
we were go and buy some food
I hope you can come to his birthday.
I hope you can come his birthday.
I was enjoying it so much!
I was enjoy it so much!

title: ERR: My Dream House
